String1: App to change the appearance of Steam
String2: I developed this app years ago when Steam allowed changing skins with relative ease, although it still works today, the skins have problems working and I cannot guarantee that all the skins work.
String3: Below I detail how it works:
String5: First of all, the app offers you a list of skins available to change Steam.
String7: In the selected skin, just click on the Download button for the skin to be downloaded and installed automatically in Steam.
String9: This is how the new selected appearance appears on Steam.
